    • withModifier

      default <R> SimpleOption.SliderCallbacks<R> withModifier(IntFunction<? extends R> sliderProgressValueToValue, ToIntFunction<? super R> valueToSliderProgressValue)
      Creates a slider callback with the modifier applied. Note that when using this, SimpleOption.IntSliderCallbacks must be constructed using the slider progress value; the modifier is applied to that callbacks.
      See Also:
      • Callback Modifiers
